alert.note: Alert for Clark (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:01AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kiowa, western Barber, Comanche and eastern Clark Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Protection, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Protection around 210 AM CDT. Coldwater and Lake Coldwater around 215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Aetna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
